page.title: 05R.E.TREM AND CO.LTD.
page.content: This company is a{marine diesel {engineering}company who make{engines and{turbines.}They are a local firm employing nine people who work Monday to Friday from 8:00am until 6:00pm in the workshop and 8:00am until 5:00pm in the office. As it is a local family business all the employees also live locally. Each employee is responsible for the care and maintainance of everthing they use including welding machinery, cranes, fork lift trucks, lathes and electric saws. The company derives its name from the owner Mr.R.E.Trem.
